_comment: Enhanced Context Plugin - Context discovery, structure validation, and guidance
_notes: Provides folder structure validation and context discovery
Tracks task/agent calls for context management
Discovers CLAUDE.md files for context enrichment
Encourages context updates on user prompts
Redirects WebFetch to markdown versions when available
description: Enhanced context discovery and maintenance for Claude Code

hooks.description: Encourages updating plans, agents, skills, and CLAUDE.md files based on user prompts
Logs Task tool calls before agent execution. Saves context for later retrieval in SubagentStop hooks.
Validates folder structure when creating .claude configuration files. Ensures proper directory organization for agents, hooks, skills, and rules.
Validates rule file structure and frontmatter. Ensures rules have proper Required Skills metadata and valid YAML frontmatter.
Validates mkdir commands for .claude directories. Prevents creation of invalid or non-standard directory structures.
Attempts to redirect WebFetch to markdown versions of documentation pages. Checks for .md versions of URLs and modifies fetch target if available.
Logs Task tool results after agent completion. Captures agent output and context for analysis.
Creates PLAN.md symlink when plan files are written. Maintains active plan reference.
Runs checks defined in .claude/rules/*.md frontmatter (lint, typecheck, vitest). Blocking on failure, 500 char limit.
Discovers and adds CLAUDE.md context when reading files. Automatically enriches Claude's context with folder-level documentation.

_planned_features: Generate code structure maps on SessionStart
Update maps when files are modified (PostToolUse)
Create navigation indexes for large codebases
